"It really depends on whether you want to be in the story or running the story. I'm in this one, but I'll be a player for the next campaign."

"Planning on playing like this again?" Yang asked

"Oh, this is the only way we'll play from now on." Weiss answered her.

Neo returned from the bathroom, wearing a diaper. The diaper in question had a picture of Ilia's face on the front center. Ilia put her face into her hands, and Neo stood hands on her hips proud of herself.

"I love the diaper Neo." Yang said with a huge smile on her face "I couldn't have done it better myself."

"We were just discussing what role Ilia will be in our dnd campaign. Maybe be a player?"

Neo shrugged and wrapped her arm around the increasingly embarrassed Ilia.

"That's a yes." Weiss smiled "So now you have to pick someone to play, and choose a race and class."

"Do you have enough to set it up now, or will we do it later?" Yang asked Neo.

Neo gave a thumbs up.

"Ok. Weiss, why doesn't Ilia just play as you?"

"I am a plot important npc thank you very much!" Weiss said proudly "I won't be in the hands of a player character."

"Oh, those games you used to play." Kali said looking at Blake "Remember when you were kicked out for being to fat?"

Blake punched her mom in the face.

Blake crossed her arms and looked away. "...I'm not fat."

Yang sat next to Blake and pulled her into a hug. "We know your not. You know, I started taking anger management and-"

"And you abuse your mom daily." Blake said dryly her eyes glancing at Raven in the corner.

Yang took a deep breath and asked "Do you feel better, now that you said that?"

"No."

"Ok. How about we have a dnd session and you calm down? If everyone's cool with it?" Yang looked around the room.

No one objected.

Weiss cleared her throat, "Very well, first things first."

“So,” Ruby said to Weiss. “We need to stop your father from continuing the blight, at the same time, we have these animal people, pigman, ratman, doing weird sex stuff.”

“Do you think they are related?” Weiss asked.

“We don’t know,” Coco admitted. “You were being held by the pigman, so for all we know your bastard father hired him to watch you.”

“We still have some reservations about your family,” Penny added, noticing Weiss looked upset. “Necromancers are kind of shady, and being some famous family of them, usually means they did some stuff in the past.”

“We use undead laborers sometimes, yes.” Weiss huffed. “But that’s because the work was dangerous and hard.”

“You made Penis Leeches.” Coco pointed out.

“I was curious as a kid, I didn’t expect them to be mind controlling leeches.”

“We’re getting off track!” Ruby cried out. “Weiss, what I want to say is we cleared the mind control off you, so I can trust you with what happened.” She turned around and revealed her tail.”

“What’s that?” Weiss asked.

“I chases the rat man,” Ruby muttered bitterly. “Cornered him, but then he mentioned I was his ‘brother’ and caused me to be forced to masturbate. I don’t know what he meant, and then I grew this tail.”

“I see…” Weiss frowned and rubbed her chin. “You might be infected with something form them. Or… a spy.”

“I’m not!” Ruby protested.

“She’s not and I tried to cleanse her just to be sure.” Penny added. “It’s possible it’s a curse or something and everyone needs to know.”

“I suppose.” Weiss said. “Do we have a clue on the animal people?” They shook their heads. “So… can we go after my father then? He needs to pay for controlling me.”

“It’s okay,” Ruby assured her, giving her a hug. “I’ll help you.”

“Thanks…” Weiss wasn’t sure why, but it felt nice with her. Then she felt something. “Ruby… that curse dick is poking me.”

“Sorry!” Ruby gasped, backing up as the other laughed. “Ever since I met the rat man, I get horny so much.”

“Want some help?” Penny asked with a smirk. “MY god encourages us to share the love.”

“And I promised we could be together if you helped me with the blight,” Coco added, removing her shirt. “We have this hotel room, might as well get it out of our system.”

“Yay!” Ruby cheered. “At least one good thing comes iwht this dick.”

“Ah… what/” Weiss stepped back as Ruby pulled down her pants. Her eyes glazed over and she fell on her knees, before plunging her mouth over Ruby’s dick.

“Someone’s eager.” Penny laughed, as Weiss slurped loudly.

“Get on the bed girls!” Ruby said.

“More controlled, but that’s default,” Yang laughed, looking over as Ruby was fucking the others in doggy style positions. “She can do anything Ruby tells her.”

“So how should I bring my character in?” Ilia asked, pointing to Pyrrha.

“Next morning,” Neo said through her computer. “Multiple ways to introduce you. Maybe you overheard them talking about the blight and want to help. Or they can save you on the route to the next city with Weiss’ sister and you fall for Ruby. Or anything really.”

“Part of roleplaying games is for you to create your character and how to react.” Velvet said. “We are just doing the sex stuff for fun. We play a bit every few days. Keeps things spicy.”

“I see…” Ilia looked over at Neo, who made kissy faces at her and she blushed. “Okay, I think I decided how I want to play Pyrrha.”

“Satyr should be fun to see,” Blake said. “We won’t see her as one, but the others will."

Yep, was coming from her. Neo grinned and pulled her into a kiss. As Ilia wrapped her arms around Neo, her hand gripped the diaper and felt it had expanded a bit and wasn’t empty.
